Proposed marine map

Proposed marine mapping implemented in LeafletJS

Proposed marine map

Marine Bedrock WMS map

Based on the British Geological survey

  • SANDSTONE/MUDSTONE Light Green
  • MUDSTONE Dark green
  • ROCK/SILICICLASTIC/ARGILLACEOUS Dark yellow
  • CLAY/SILT/SAND Light orange
  • CHALK Strong Green
  • ROCK/SILICICLASTIC/ARGILLACEOUS/SANDSTONE Strong yellow

  • Map information
  • Application:
  • LeafletJS
  • Base map:
  • MapBox
  • Layer(s):
  • WMS

Created with the Jekyll static site generator, written in the Ruby programming language. The site generation is implemented in the Liquid template language. Hosted on Github Pages, the layout is based on Bootstrap and jQuery and inspired by the Clean blog Bootstrap theme by David Miller.
